## How to clone repository from Github to local directory 
detail info can be found in this link <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NInwldFZgwA>.

1. Copy the repository http from Github Code.

2.Go to R studio and create a new project.

3.Go to version control and paste the link above in the Repository URL.

4.Create a RMarkdown File and then the R cell can be conducted.
